column5: Lake Buchanan open waterfront cottage, in a small, safe and secluded neighborhood at the end of the road. If you want to get away in quietness, peacefulness and relax, this is the place. 1.5 hour drive from central Austin. Walk right into the water from the back yard - bring your kayaks! Sit on the porch and watch the wildlife - bring your camera. Neighborhood is great for walking or cycling.
